statements.query: MATCH (:GCPUser)-[r:ASSUME_ROLE]->(:GCPRole)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject{id: $GCP_PROJECT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:GCPOrganization{id:$GCP_ORGANIZATION_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Remove GCP GCPRole-to-Principal relationships that are out of date.
